text:
@realDonaldTrump You had no doubt Covid-19 cases would go from 15 to 0.
You had no doubt the spring heat would kill the virus
You had no doubt that Hydroxychloroquin was the cure!
You had no doubt that lysol would kill the virus

You have 6 bankruptcies and America is your 7th👇👇

You know sh*t! https://t.co/Bvth08pWbf
